title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: Managing Confusion and Improving Learning Outcomes in Digital Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can recognize and classify confusion in digital environments and apply three or more strategies to resolve them
Learners can independently perform over 80% of the process of solving project problems through interactive tools and peer feedback exchange
Learners can document over ten cases of confusion occurring during a six-month PBL process and write improvement reports reflecting these cases
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
